author: Ult (Discord: ultpanda)
name: OnePieceAFK
short: ⚓🏴‍☠️ One Piece themed AFK and adventure system
description:
Embark on a grand adventure in the vast world of One Piece! This comprehensive cog brings the excitement and wonder of the Grand Line to your Discord server.

🏝️ Features:
• Explore iconic islands from East Blue to the New World
• Build and manage your own pirate crew
• Train Haki and learn character-specific skills
• Discover and use powerful Devil Fruits
• Engage in thrilling battles against Marines and other pirates
• Participate in Davy Back Fights and crew alliances
• Experience dynamic world events and seasonal content
• Climb the ranks on various leaderboards

⚔️ Commands include:
• !explore - Set sail for adventure
• !haki - Enhance your Haki abilities
• !cb - Test your crew's strength
• !eat - Gain extraordinary powers
• !davy - Risk it all in pirate competitions

💰 Progress:
• Increase your bounty through various activities
• Collect rare items and build your inventory
• Develop your character with unique skills and abilities

🌊 World Events:
• Face the consequences of World Government interventions
• Participate in limited-time seasonal events
• Adapt to a changing world with random global occurrences

Whether you dream of becoming the Pirate King or just want to explore the Blues, OnePieceAFK offers an immersive, ever-evolving experience for fans and newcomers alike!
install_msg: Ahoy, future Pirate King! 🏴‍☠️ Thank you for installing the OnePieceAFK cog. Your grand adventure in the world of One Piece begins now! Use `[p]help OnePieceAFK` to see all available commands. May the winds be in your favor, and remember: the One Piece is real!
end_user_data_statement:
This cog stores user data essential for gameplay, including but not limited to:
• Adventure status and progress
• Bounty and currency amounts
• Crew affiliations and alliances
• Character skills, Haki levels, and Devil Fruit powers
• Inventory items
• Exploration history and achievements

All stored data is used to provide a persistent and engaging user experience. Users can request complete data deletion at any time, which will reset their in-game progress.

changelog: 1.0.1 - Added more islands and world events
1.1.0 - Introduced seasonal events and Davy Back Fights
